metadata.description: In a world where angels watch over the humans below and punish the fallens: entities of pure evil. Teigi lived an average life; hating the fallens, throwing fits over his flirting friends, and helping Konan with his drug addiction. But, one fateful day, all of that changed. What will Teigi do now that he's been turned into a fallens?! Will it be fight or flight, and will these #friends ever meet again? Find out now in this action-packed manga!
metadata.name: FALLENS (Media Do)
